name: fullstack-project
description: Fullstack project with React and Node.js

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.firebase-emulators: concurrently "npm run start:firebase" "npm run start:server" "npm run dev"
